author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to make XML files for cassette tests from an overall silicon wafer flat file of HGCal

#### PR validation:

Use the modified script to make XML files

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx354A Attempt to make xml files for cassette tests from an overall silicon wafer flat file of HGCal
